Name: Toscana Rosso
Wine Description: Deep red, with shade of purple. Pervasive balsamic notes are accompanied by hints of ripe dark,black fruit and flowers in a perfect aromatic balance. Long silky and caressing, black truffles with lovely variegated complex sensations. The finish is endless, elegant. A master in balance.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has an impactful spectrum of blue and black fruit aromas typical of each unique sub-appellation. warm blackberry, dark blueberry and plum are interwoven with cassis and toasted barrel spices. It showcases a rich texture and velvety, long tannins telling of the wine’s graceful aging potential.

Name: Branding Iron Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The aromas of wild berry and forest. Earth and sage complement the fruit and give a depth of flavor on the midpalate. The spicy oak and vanilla components add complexity, while the gentle tannins are approachable now.

Name: Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has engaging aromas of cassis and early-season blackberries weave harmoniously with dried herbs, violet-floral, garrigue (a fresh minty-sage character) and a sense of minerality, in a silky ribbon of flavor that flows elegantly into a long, lingering finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep complex and intense black currant, rolled tobacco, violets, wet slate, dutch cocao, iodine and wild thyme on the nose. In the mouth, powerful and intense with a deep concentrated marriage of fruit flavours including red and black currants, liquorice and courveture. The characteristic fine yet firm structural tannins frame the fruit perfectly and carry the flavours and balance the mineral elements from the vineyard to provide an incredibly long and classically structured finish.

Name: La Tartufaia Barolo
Wine Description: Aroma is very rich, spacing from fresh prunes, towards spices and finally reaching the notes of minerals and flowers, such as violets and roses. The taste is fresh, intense, lengthy and full-bodied, with rich and smooth tannins.

Name: Irmgard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has leagues of depth and aromatic notes of forest floor, cassis, and cinnamon. On the palate, notes of plum, cranberry compote, rosemary, oolong tea and a zesty acidity draw out into a clean perfumed finish.

Name: Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: It has Very deep and intense ruby red. The nose is intense and very persistent; the primary aromas typical of the varietal blend harmoniously with the bouquets developed during aging. Full bodied, warm, mellow; hints of black pepper and cinnamon with crisp penetrating nots of balsam.

Name: Langhe Rosso
Wine Description: It has garnet-red color with ruby shades. Intense nose with a clear “goudron” (tarry) aroma, tobacco, spices and white flowers. Full and elegant taste with a great structure, consistent with the olfactory sensations.

Name: Pinot Noir Ryan Vineyard
Wine Description: Graceful aromas of rose petal, tea, cassis and clay accent a beautiful strawberry brick hue. This Ryan is firmly structured & intense with classic Mt Harlan mineral purity. Mouthwatering flavors of cranberry, sour cherry and calcium offer fascinating tension with the taut, well integrated tannins offering a bright and very complex wine, and definitely a candidate for cellaring.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Caves
Wine Description: It has black cherry fruit with aromas of spices and mushroom with a mid-palate of rich earth and broad mouth appeal and a long finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Beautiful ruby color and opens with bright aromas of rose petal, dark cherry and strawberry followed by cocoa, tobacco and warm spices. Expressive boysenberry, plum, sweet cherry, juicy strawberry, and toasty mocha flavors lend complexity and depth on the palate.The profile of supple tannins, silky texture and balanced acidity result in an opulent, elegant, lingering finish.

Name: Monolith
Wine Description: Deep ruby garnet in color, rich, bright nose of caramel, earth & blueberries. Clean attack of Asian spice & mineral high tones. The mid-pallet is silky but heavily loaded with black currant jam & fine grained tannin. The finish lingers for several minutes & leaves you with a hint of cola and dry earth.

Name: Steffensen Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Chocolate and blueberry flavors dominate this bold full-bodied Cabernet, along with hints of mocha and cedar. This well rounded cabernet adds depth and body with well balanced tannins and a remarkable finish.

Name: Nebbiolo Langhe
Wine Description: Strong structure, which gives the wine a wonderfully even tension. Classical aromas rise from the vibrant acidity and enormous depth: rose petals, cherry, but also plum.

Name: Redwoods’ Edge Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Notes of clove, all spice, sweet black tea and wild berry highlight the entry, with red fruit, Alpine strawberry, and sweet vanillin blossoming on the bright, expansive mid palate, and persisting through the long, nuanced finish.

Name: Côte-Rôtie
Wine Description: Beautiful color, black fruit aromas and on the palate, good harmony between strength and elegance

Name: Castello del Terriccio
Wine Description: It has has rich balsamic, spice and violet aromas with dense, blackberry, blackcurrant and chocolate flavours on the palate with mint note.

Name: NeroMàccarj
Wine Description: It has ruby red, with intense, deep violet reflections. It has ethereal, intense, characteristic of red fruit and vanilla. It has elegant, harmonious, lingering finish.

Name: Red Dog Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The nose opens to an alluring perfume of candied raspberry, rose hips, and orange peel followed by rich aromas of cigar, cedar, and forest floor.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Reserve
Wine Description: A complex wine, delicate, rich and elegant. A Galilean Cabernet Sauvignon with a Bordeaux soul. A balancing act of intense tastes and European elegance. Drinks well now but will age beautifully for many years to come.

Name: Barbaresco
Wine Description: Elegance and velvety, with ripe and spicy fruit. Strong tannins, but elegant. Good structure and concentration. Very long life.

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Red garnet. very intense, characteristic. Full, warm, velvety with hints of fruit mature and underbrush.

Name: Galitzine Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has depth of aromas and flavors of dark black fruits, anise, cocoa nibs, espresso and cinnamon.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: It has a ruby red color, a pleasant nose and well composed, marked on intense red fruit aromas purple and evolve with the aging in bottle to dry plums.

Name: Russian River Valley Reserve Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has a cool morning fog that rises off the river followed by sunny, warm days and breezy afternoons. The combination of these factors allows the grapes to ripen at a slow, steady pace, which heightens the intensity and complexity of the fruit flavor.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Bright acidity showcases the red current, cranberry and plum. The well integrated oak compliments the structure and nuances of the mid-palette. The slight spice and herbal minerality lead to a beautiful lingering finish.

Name: Barolo Cerretta
Wine Description: Garnet intense, dark and concentrated bouquet. Violet, dried rose, cherry to the nose. The palate shows off richness, solid body, invigorating tannins, silky and precise closure.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Garnet red in color, this shows an incredible variety of aroma due to the grape’s natural characteristics and long aging period that add complexity, body and class. It has great structure and a big tannins, that smooth out during the aging process, with a structure that perfectly matches with its massive aromas.

Name: Barolo Brunate
Wine Description: It has delicately scented with hints of pink and purple, great aromatic complexity. It can be enjoyed after a few months after bottling

Name: Pinot Noir Jensen Vineyard
Wine Description: Jensen Vineyard Pinot Noir is a ballerina; graceful, subtly powerful, and delicate in an expansive way. Aromas of Bing cherry, soft sweet oak and the faintest whisper of watermelon accent the classic Jensen broad flavors of blackberry, cassis, herb, violets and mineral from this complex vineyard block planted with four different aspects to the sun. There’s an exquisite brightness, depth and suppleness of texture in this alluring and wonderful wine.
